Name: Pineapple Daiquiri (Difford's recipe)
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Tangy pineapple fruit laced with characterful rums. Yumm!
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See: Daiquiri cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Daiquiri (Difford's recipe) contains 210 calories
